channel.title: [pi] help please i am desperate! rep++
channel.description:
I am wanting to add A Multi combat area where more than 1 person can attack 1 npc does anyone know how to? Also, I really want to know if anyone knows how to Add a wilderness spot , because i am trying to make a pk box.
Please help with either or both of them questions please i am desperate =[

item.title: [pi] help please i am desperate! rep++
item.dc:creator: @Hextix Hextix
item.description:
@Hextix wrote:

Stop adding eachother and please i need someone, this is not the place to get together and have a party, i added that guy on messenger and he wanted me to download something (pretty sure a virus) and i said nty.

Does ANYONE know how to answer my question on how to add multi area’s or pk area? please respond someone, anyone

Read full topic
